languages.text: {n}Кассия облегченно выдыхает, но тут же взгляд ее рубиновых глаз мрачнеет.{/n} "Представители Дома продолжают следить за мной. И ренегаты, и верноподданные. Не думаю, что кто-то из них согласится на временное перемирие, дабы вместе узреть истину о зарождении Атласа. А я... не хочу, чтобы Дом Орселлио потерял еще хоть кого-то в очередной братоубийственной стычке. Нет. За ответами о прошлом я отправлюсь сама".

{n}Cassia breathes a sigh of relief, but the look in her ruby eyes quickly darkens again.{/n} "The House is still watching me. Both the renegades and the loyalists. I doubt that any of them will agree even to a brief armistice for the sake of learning the truth about the Atlas's origins. And I... do not wish to see House Orsellio lose even one more life to another fratricidal skirmish. No. I shall go after the answers about our past on my own."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия облегченно выдыхает, но тут же взгляд ее рубиновых глаз мрачнеет.{/n} "Представители Дома продолжают следить за мной. И ренегаты, и верноподданные. Не думаю, что кто-то из них согласится на временное перемирие, дабы вместе узреть истину о зарождении Атласа. languages.text: {n}カシアは安堵のため息をこぼすが、紅玉の瞳がまたすぐに暗くなる。{/n}「オーセリオ家はまだ私を監視しています、反逆派と忠誠派の双方が。アトラスの起源に関わる真実を探るために、短期間であれ休戦協定を受け入れるとは思えません。それに…これ以上の衝突でオーセリオ家の命をひとりたりとも失いたくないのです。いえ、それは違いますね。私は独力でわが家の過去に関する答えを追い求めるつもりです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia breathes a sigh of relief, but the look in her ruby eyes quickly darkens again.{/n} "The House is still watching me. Both the renegades and the loyalists. I doubt that any of them will agree even to a brief armistice for the sake of learning the truth about the Atlas's origins. And I... do not wish to see House Orsellio lose even one more life to another fratricidal skirmish. No. I shall go after the answers about our past on my own."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは安堵のため息をこぼすが、紅玉の瞳がまたすぐに暗くなる。{/n}「オーセリオ家はまだ私を監視しています、反逆派と忠誠派の双方が。アトラスの起源に関わる真実を探るために、短期間であれ休戦協定を受け入れるとは思えません。それに…これ以上の衝突でオーセリオ家の命をひとりたりとも失いたくないのです。いえ、それは違いますね。私は独力でわが家の過去に関する答えを追い求めるつもりです」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅松了口气，但红宝石般的眼睛很快再次黯淡下来。{/n}“家族的人都在留意我，无论是叛徒还是忠臣。我在想，说不定他们愿意暂时休战，一起寻找圣仪起源的真相。而我……我再也不想看到奥赛罗家族内部发生冲突了，我不希望再有任何人因此丧命了。不，我一定要亲自找到答案，解开关于我过去的谜团。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia breathes a sigh of relief, but the look in her ruby eyes quickly darkens again.{/n} "The House is still watching me. Both the renegades and the loyalists. I doubt that any of them will agree even to a brief armistice for the sake of learning the truth about the Atlas's origins. And I... do not wish to see House Orsellio lose even one more life to another fratricidal skirmish. No. I shall go after the answers about our past on my own."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅松了口气，但红宝石般的眼睛很快再次黯淡下来。{/n}“家族的人都在留意我，无论是叛徒还是忠臣。我在想，说不定他们愿意暂时休战，一起寻找圣仪起源的真相。而我……我再也不想看到奥塞罗家族内部发生冲突了，我不希望再有任何人因此丧命了。不，我一定要亲自找到答案，解开关于我过去的谜团。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement, mais son regard rubis se fait plus dur.{/n} « La maison me surveille toujours. Aussi bien les renégats que les loyalistes. Je doute que les uns comme les autres acceptent la moindre trêve, même pour découvrir la vérité sur les origines de l'Atlas. Et je... j'aimerais autant que possible éviter que la maison Orsellio perde un autre de ses membres dans une énième lutte fratricide. Non. J'irais chercher les réponses seule. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia breathes a sigh of relief, but the look in her ruby eyes quickly darkens again.{/n} "The House is still watching me. Both the renegades and the loyalists. I doubt that any of them will agree even to a brief armistice for the sake of learning the truth about the Atlas's origins. And I... do not wish to see House Orsellio lose even one more life to another fratricidal skirmish. No. I shall go after the answers about our past on my own."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement, mais son regard rubis se fait plus dur.{/n} « La maison me surveille toujours. Aussi bien les renégats que les loyalistes. Je doute que les uns comme les autres acceptent la moindre trêve, même pour découvrir la vérité sur les origines de l'Atlas. Et je... j'aimerais autant que possible éviter que la maison Orsellio perde un autre de ses membres dans une énième lutte fratricide. Non. J'irais chercher les réponses seule. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia suelta un suspiro de alivio, pero la alegría de sus ojos color rubí no tarda en ensombrecerse de nuevo.{/n} «La casa me vigila con recelo. Renegados y lealistas por igual. Dudo que ninguno de ellos acceda a un armisticio, por breve que sea, con tal de descubrir la verdad sobre el origen del Atlas. Además... no deseo que la casa Orsellio pierda una sola vida más en la enésima escaramuza fratricida. No. Iré yo sola a buscar las respuestas sobre nuestro pasado».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia breathes a sigh of relief, but the look in her ruby eyes quickly darkens again.{/n} "The House is still watching me. Both the renegades and the loyalists. I doubt that any of them will agree even to a brief armistice for the sake of learning the truth about the Atlas's origins. And I... do not wish to see House Orsellio lose even one more life to another fratricidal skirmish. No. I shall go after the answers about our past on my own."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia suelta un suspiro de alivio, pero la alegría de sus ojos color rubí no tarda en ensombrecerse de nuevo.{/n} «La casa me vigila con recelo. Renegados y lealistas por igual. Dudo que ninguno de ellos acceda a un armisticio, por breve que sea, con tal de descubrir la verdad sobre el origen del Atlas. Además... no deseo que la casa Orsellio pierda una sola vida más en la enésima escaramuza fratricida. No. Iré yo sola a buscar las respuestas sobre nuestro pasado».

languages.text: {n}Cassia atmet erleichtert auf, doch der Blick in ihren rubinroten Augen verdüstert sich schnell wieder.{/n} "Das Haus beobachtet mich noch immer. Sowohl die Abtrünnigen als auch die Loyalisten. Ich bezweifle, dass einer von ihnen wenigstens einem kurzen Waffenstillstand zustimmen würde, um die Wahrheit über die Herkunft des Atlas zu erfahren. Und ich ... will nicht, dass Haus Orsellio noch ein einziges Leben an einen Bruderkonflikt verliert. Nein. Ich suche allein nach den Antworten zu unserer Vergangenheit."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia breathes a sigh of relief, but the look in her ruby eyes quickly darkens again.{/n} "The House is still watching me. Both the renegades and the loyalists. I doubt that any of them will agree even to a brief armistice for the sake of learning the truth about the Atlas's origins. And I... do not wish to see House Orsellio lose even one more life to another fratricidal skirmish. No. I shall go after the answers about our past on my own."

Und ich ... will nicht, dass Haus Orsellio noch ein einziges Leben an einen Bruderkonflikt verliert. Nein. Ich suche allein nach den Antworten zu unserer Vergangenheit."

languages.text: {n}Cassia rahat bir nefes alıyor ancak çok geçmeden yakut kırmızısı gözlerindeki bakışlar yeniden ciddiyete bürünüyor.{/n} "Hanem beni izliyor olacak. Hainler de, sadık kalanlar da. Sırf Atlas'ın kökeni hakkındaki hakikati öğrenmek adına iki tarafın da kısa bir süreliğine olsun ateşkes kabul edeceğini sanmıyorum. Ayrıca... Kardeşin kardeşi katlettiği çatışmalarda Orsellio Hanesi'nden bir can daha kaybetmek istemiyorum. Olmaz. Kendi geçmişim hakkındaki cevapları kendim keşfedeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia breathes a sigh of relief, but the look in her ruby eyes quickly darkens again.{/n} "The House is still watching me. Both the renegades and the loyalists. I doubt that any of them will agree even to a brief armistice for the sake of learning the truth about the Atlas's origins. And I... do not wish to see House Orsellio lose even one more life to another fratricidal skirmish. No. I shall go after the answers about our past on my own."
